name: Led A-Stray
description:
Led A-Stray Summary:

A short light hearted visual novel about a girl and a stray. It takes about 15 minutes to complete.  

This visual novel was made for https://itch.io/jam/duo-jam

We took Duo Jam as an opportunity to test our in-development Unity dialogue system (powered by Yarn Spinner).  Using it to make a game for a week allowed us to find (so many) bugs, to figure out what features we'd like to implement in the future, and to get a feel for the full process of storywriting from inception to execution.

We recommend that you play in fullscreen for the optimal experience!

Control:

Advance dialogue: LeftClick/Space/Enter/Z

Open menu: Esc/Backspace/Home/C
